title: PE Behemoth CVC Names Rutland President as Part of Biggest-Ever Promotions Group
description: CVC Capital Partners Plc promoted Peter Rutland to be president as the private capital behemoth beefs up its top ranks less than two years into its life as a publicly traded company, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: CVC Capital Partners Plc promoted Peter Rutland to be president as the private capital behemoth beefs up its top ranks less than two years into its life as a publicly traded company, according to people familiar with the matter.
